channel.title: How do i bump a thread without double posting?
channel.description: I'm in a spot of trouble and need to know how to bump a thread without double posting, can anyone help?

item.title: How do i bump a thread without double posting?
item.dc:creator: @joshsilly joshsilly

lovin it I Br3ndan I

item.title: How do i bump a thread without double posting?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Wait till someone else posts a comment then post something. Bumping is against the rules, so is double-posting. If you do double-post, do it and then delete the date, time, etc. So it just looks like a normal message. Make sure it’s got purpose though.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i bump a thread without double posting?
